original_text: “For the lips of a priest ought to preserve knowledge, because he is the messenger of the Lord Almighty and people seek instruction from his mouth.
korean_text: 제사장의 입술은 지식을 지켜야 하겠고 사람들은 그의 입에서 율법을 구하게 되어야 할 것이니 제사장은 만군의 여호와의 사자가 됨이거늘

sentences.original_text: For the lips of a priest ought to preserve knowledge
because he is the messenger of the Lord Almighty
and people seek instruction from his mouth
